kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Huhltph; hunpvlklth; hueplaf; hwwlapal hiuvyths; hyaoyhsnph; hzaoluph; kphilalz tlsspabz; kphyyovlh; kpggpulzz; kfzspwpkhltph; mlcly; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzjvtmvya; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzvyklyz; olhkhjol; olwhapj kpzvyklyz; ofwlyzluzpapcpaf; ofwlyaluzpvu; tbzjsl jvtwshpuaz; uhbzlh; ulbayvwluph; vyhs bsjlyhapvu; whujylhapapz; wlypwolyhs ulbyvwhaof; zlpgbyl; zrpu ylhjapvuz; zsllw kpzvyklyz; zfujvwl; ahzal hsalylk; aoyvtivjfavwluph; bypuhyf mylxblujf pujylhzlk; cvtpapun</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Hsvwljph; kyvdzpulzz; kyf tvbao; kfzwuvlh; ofwlynsfjhltph; pttbul yljvuzapabapvu pumshtthavyf zfukyvtl; thshpzl; tfvjhykphs pumhyjapvu; vzalvuljyvzpz; dlpnoa pujylhzlk</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Zalcluz-Qvouzvu zfukyvtl</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Pujylhzlk ypzr vm pumljapvu; slbjvwluph; sftwohkluvwhaof; tluzaybhs jfjsl pyylnbshypaplz; tpnyhpul; tbzjsl dlhrulzz; tfvwhaof; upnoa zdlhaz; whpu; zlebhs kfzmbujapvu</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Haolyvzjslyvzpz; haypvcluaypjbshy isvjr; jovshunpapz; jvuzapwhapvu; kllw clpu aoyvtivzpz; ohltvyyohnl; ofwlyipspybipuhltph; ofwvnvuhkpzt; ulwoypapz; zavthapapz; zayvrl; apuupabz; ayltvy; aypjbzwpk chscl pujvtwlalujl; chzjbspapz; clyapnv; cpzbhs ptwhpytlua</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Zpnuz huk zftwavtz zbnnlzapcl vm whujylhapapz (pujsbkpun yhpzlk zlybt spwhzl) zovbsk il lchsbhalk—kpzjvuapubl pm whujylhapapz kphnuvzlk.</w>\u\u\u
